response.overview: Fatima and Ali adopt a child after they were certain that she would not have children due to an illness the husband contracted. However, this child told the couple that Ali had a son with Al-Zawhara, his fiancée, before his marriage to Fatima. Ali is surprised by this news, because what is true in the news is that he has a relationship with a former fiancée with the same name as the child “Al-Bashir” mentioned, but whether he has a son is something he does not know. Faced with this news, the wife began to doubt the mind of the abandoned child, and they tried to return him to the children’s home, but to no avail. However, the husband wants to know where this child got this information from, so he lures him and the child tells him that he lived with him in his time. And that his son bears the name Ali, as is his name, and that his mother died. The husband tries to find out the source of the news, but the child tells him that he had previously seen these events.
response.title: راجل حليمة
